## CCSelectorCombinedProps.grid2ErrorProps property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Props passed to the MUI Grid2 item component that the error message component is wrapped in, if the country code components are wrapped in a Grid2. Overwrites the `grid2ItemProps`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
grid2ErrorProps?: Grid2ItemProps;
```
